main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a shapeless, yellow and white object in Newport, Pennsylvania on 26 July 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 to 20 minutes., The observer speculated that the object might have been a balloon., The event was recorded as part of Project Blue Book., The investigation was assigned to Flight 15 of the Special Projects Section., The sighting occurred after a previous date noted as 21/06/52.
